Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that sanctuary policies do not mean that undocumented criminals are released as standard operating procedure.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent to which dangerous criminal aliens are released by local officials in sanctuary cities.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that local officials order police to release dangerous criminal aliens.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that sanctuary policies result in dangerous criminals being released to prey upon the public.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that sanctuary policies have provisions allowing police to cooperate with ICE for noncitizens with previous felony convictions.
